articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: An undercover reporter catches a serial fraudster back on a dating app days after leaving jail.
articles.title: Romance conman Ray McDonald back on dating app after jail release

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.
articles.title: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health

articles.description: The move marks the culmination of a decade-long push by the president to tear up climate policies he argues stifle industry.
articles.title: Analysis: Trump takes victory lap after biggest climate rollback yet

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Cabinet Office says the move is "by mutual agreement" but it follows months of negative media reports about his performance.
articles.title: Sir Chris Wormald stands down as head of Civil Service

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Kelly explains why she decided to try "gentle parenting" and the impact it has had on her child.
articles.title: Why I stopped saying no to my toddler

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The shooting in British Columbia has been met with shock and sadness, with residents saying nearly everyone has been impacted in some way.
articles.title: Tumbler Ridge grieves after one of Canada's deadliest mass shootings

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Scientists have discovered how to make people less selfish - slightly and temporarily - by stimulating two areas of the brain.
articles.title: Brain stimulating test makes people 'less selfish'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Rain plus the political environment is creating a "powerful psychological need for escape", travel agents say.
articles.title: Rise in half-term holiday bookings after rainy January

articles.title: Vaping in cars with children could be banned under new plans
